alert.note: Alert for Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 01 at 11:27AM MDT until October 01 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, and Lower Rio Grande Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on west-to-east roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
